column5: smashed her Toyota Landcruiser GXR at 20.30 on May 1
column7: at the junction of the 7 Makara Eastern Flyover along Russian Federation Road. ------Before the incident
column8: the woman was driving the luxury car without a license plate
column9: in a drunken state westbound. The car hit a concrete divider on the way up to the bridge
column10: causing serious damage to the front bumper
column11: but no one was hurt.------The car immediately tried to flee the scene
column12: but below the bridge it was intercepted by traffic authorities.------After the incident
column13: local authorities also came to intervene and took the the car to the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Headquarters to wait for legal action. ------POST NEWS
